snippet: Participant, an issues-oriented entertainment company, had been temporarily overseen by its founder, Jeffrey Skoll, after the resignation of Jim Berk in April.
abstract: David Linde, former co-chairman of Universal Pictures, will replace Jim Berk as chief executive of Participant Media.
lead_paragraph: Participant, an issues-oriented entertainment company, had been temporarily overseen by its founder, Jeffrey Skoll, after the resignation of Jim Berk in April.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Former Universal Head Named C.E.O. of Participant Media
headline.main: David Linde, Formerly of Universal Pictures, to Lead Participant Media
